title: Small finance banks now going big on deposit rates
description: Several small finance banks have increased their fixed deposit rates to over 8% for two-year tenures, competing with major banks like SBI and HDFC Bank. This move comes as alternative investment options grow, drawing funds away from traditional deposits. Some finance companies are also offering competitive rates above 8% on fixed deposits.
